
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(clickhouse-base-base)
target_compile_options(clickhouse-base-base PUBLIC
  -DOS_LINUX
)
target_compile_options(clickhouse-base-base PRIVATE
  -DBOOST_ASIO_HAS_STD_INVOKE_RESULT=1
  -DBOOST_ASIO_STANDALONE=1
  -DHAS_RESERVED_IDENTIFIER
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP11
  -DPOCO_HAVE_FD_EPOLL
  -DPOCO_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
  -DWITH_COVERAGE=0
  -D_LIBCPP_ENABLE_THREAD_SAFETY_ANNOTATIONS
  -D__GCC_HAVE_DWARF2_CFI_ASM=1
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(clickhouse-base-base PUBLIC
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/miniselect/include
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/pdqsort
)
target_include_directories(clickhouse-base-base PRIVATE
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/cityhash-1.0.2
)
target_link_libraries(clickhouse-base-base PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  contrib-libs-fmt
  libs-poco-Foundation
  libs-poco-Net
  libs-poco-Util
  contrib-restricted-cityhash-1.0.2
  restricted-patched-replxx
)
target_sources(clickhouse-base-base PRIVATE
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/JSON.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/LineReader.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/ReplxxLineReader.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/StringRef.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/argsToConfig.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/coverage.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/demangle.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/errnoToString.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/getAvailableMemoryAmount.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/getFQDNOrHostName.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/getMemoryAmount.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/getPageSize.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/getThreadId.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/mremap.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/phdr_cache.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/preciseExp10.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/safeExit.cpp
  ${YT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base/base/setTerminalEcho.cpp
